name: eReefs THREDDS Data Server catalogue
description: eReefs research project aims to develop a platform providing a comprehensive view of dynamic marine environment conditions across the Great Barrier Reef from end-of-catchments and estuaries to reef lagoons and the open ocean. The system provides information on physical processes, sediment transport, biogeochemistry and ocean colour, addressing enhanced monitoring, data standards, data architecture, operational modelling, reporting and data visualisation.
